name: bus-tracking-backend
description: Backend API for Bus Tracking System with real-time GPS tracking, smart trip matching, and comprehensive authentication

scripts.build: echo 'No build step required for Node.js backend'
scripts.health-check: node -e "require('axios').get(process.env.API_BASE_URL + '/health').then(r => console.log('✅ Health check passed:', r.data)).catch(e => console.error('❌ Health check failed:', e.message))"

author: Bus Tracking Team
